summary: This document is an email correspondence involving Jes Staley and Erik G Ortel discussing a quote from 'The Street.com' regarding Staley's role as CEO of JPMorgan Chase's investment bank. It highlights Staley's confidence during his presentation at the investor day event.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is mentioned as the CEO of JPMorgan Chase's investment bank, presenting at an investor day event.

persons.name: Erik G Ortel
persons.context: Erik G Ortel is mentioned as the sender of the email containing the quote about Jes Staley's presentation.

events.title: JPMorgan Chase Investor Day
events.description: Jes Staley presented as the CEO of the investment bank at JPMorgan Chase's investor day to a large audience.

keyFacts: Jes Staley was presenting for the first time as CEO of JPMorgan Chase's investment bank.
The investor day event had more than 400 attendees and many more listening remotely.
The email correspondence discusses a quote from 'The Street.com' regarding Staley's presentation.
